# 人机边界重构——工业智能迈向规模化的引爆点

## 下载

### Docker

```
docker pull apachecn0/renji-bianjie-zhonggou-gongye-zhineng-maixiang-guimohua-de-yinbao-dian
docker run -tid -p <port>:80 apachecn0/renji-bianjie-zhonggou-gongye-zhineng-maixiang-guimohua-de-yinbao-dian
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### PYPI

```
pip install renji-bianjie-zhonggou-gongye-zhineng-maixiang-guimohua-de-yinbao-dian
renji-bianjie-zhonggou-gongye-zhineng-maixiang-guimohua-de-yinbao-dian <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### NPM

```
npm install -g renji-bianjie-zhonggou-gongye-zhineng-maixiang-guimohua-de-yinbao-dian
renji-bianjie-zhonggou-gongye-zhineng-maixiang-guimohua-de-yinbao-dian <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```
